QuestData.Title: Time for Answers
QuestData.Description: You have a lot of questions, $n. You're the only one who can see me because you touched something that once belonged to him... don't you remember?$B$BYou don't know what it is? Well I can't just tell you... that would make him really mad. He's not just a prince anymore... he's the king!$B$BMeet me at the Court of Bones, north of Icecrown Citadel and you can see for yourself.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Matthias Lehner at the Court of Bones.
QuestData.RewardText: There you are. I started to wonder whether you'd show up.
